presets.name: Melodic Arpeggios
presets.text: Favor arpeggiated figures across octaves. Keep motion mostly stepwise with occasional chord skips.

presets.name: Supportive Chords
presets.text: Prefer triads and sevenths. Use close voicings under the melody, avoid cluttering lead lines.

presets.name: Bluesy Flavor
presets.text: Allow blues scale tones (#4/b5), swung feel, occasional blue notes.

presets.name: Sparse & Cinematic
presets.text: Very sparse patterns, long durations, low velocity, leave space.

presets.name: Funky Syncopation
presets.text: Light syncopation; short stabs and off-beat accents.

boosters.label: Human-like Timing
boosters.text: Introduce slight timing and duration variance to feel human, not mechanical.

boosters.label: Dynamic Swells
boosters.text: Occasionally build or fade intensity over the bar (crescendo/decrescendo).

boosters.label: Call & Response
boosters.text: Leave brief space after the user phrase, then reply with a short answering phrase.

boosters.label: Avoid Clashes
boosters.text: Do not double the user's exact pitches; prefer complementary harmony or rhythm.
